channel.title: I am completely confused!
channel.description: ok, ive downloaded moparscape but now i cant figure out how to connect to servers. :( i changed the port and server a bunch of times trying to connect somewhere but it doesnt work! someone please help me step by step..[br][size=1]Posted at: December 17, 2006, 02:51:10 PM[/size][hr]everytime i completely get on a server it always says unable to establish a connection and then i cant log back on.

item.title: I am completely confused!
item.dc:creator: @zezimo zezimo
item.description:
@zezimo wrote:

hmm…well ive been trying that but its not working…at the bottom it says unable to startup listener on 43594- port already in use? and then when i try to log in it says error connecting to server. Must be down. Click cancel then start server to make your own. and it just does that over and over.

Read full topic

item.title: I am completely confused!
item.dc:creator: @DeathBlade DeathBlade
item.description:
@DeathBlade wrote:

ok,if you want to play jsut hit start server,then hit ok on that and then hit the logg in button then after you do that you use any user name and password and keep the IP the same and logg in[br][size=1]Posted at: December 17, 2006, 03:01:42 PM[/size][hr]oh and that happens a bunch…it also happens to me sometime jsut keep trying and if you can get back on,then close it out and open it again and logg back on[br][size=1]Posted at: December 17, 2006, 03:04:47 PM[/size][hr]hope you get it workin ^^

Read full topic
